description:
Kuroitsu`s team needs a stamp of approval from each of Agastia`s executives to get their latest request fulfilled. But terror (and frustration) awaits at each of their lairs!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sauvés par un sourire du prix mortel d’un pacte avec le démon demeurant dans l’abîme, tel le sceau de Salomon
Saved by a Smile from the Deadly Price Typically Extracted Through Deals with Monsters That Dwell in the Deep Like a True Ring of Solomon
Shin`en ni Sumaishi Mamono to no Keiyaku wa, Sono Mi no Hametsu o Taika to Suru mo, Ichimatsu no Emi ni Yotte Sukuwareru, Solomon Ou no Yubiwa ga Gotoku
深淵に住まいし魔物との契約は, その身の破滅を対価とするも, 一抹の笑みによって救われる, ソロモン王の指輪が如く
